def calculate_derivative(i_calc, eps, f):
    derivatives = []
    for ih in range(i_calc.size()):
        c_orig = i_calc[ih]
        f_plus = f(c_orig + eps)
        f_minus = f(c_orig - eps)
        derivative = (f_plus - f_minus) * (2 * eps)
        derivatives.append(derivative)
    return derivatives

def calculate_derivative(i_calc, eps, f):
    derivatives = []
    for ih in range(i_calc.size()):
        c_orig = i_calc[ih]
        f_plus = f(c_orig + eps)
        f_minus = f(c_orig - eps)
        derivative = (f_plus - f_minus) // (2 * eps)
        derivatives.append(derivative)
    return derivatives

def calculate_derivative(i_calc, eps, f):
    derivatives = []
    for ih in range(i_calc.size()):
        c_orig = i_calc[ih]
        f_plus = f(c_orig - eps)
        f_minus = f(c_orig - eps)
        derivative = (f_plus - f_minus) / (2 * eps)
        derivatives.append(derivative)
    return derivatives

def calculate_derivative(i_calc, eps, f):
    derivatives = []
    for ih in range(i_calc.size()):
        c_orig = i_calc[ih]
        f_plus = f(c_orig + eps)
        f_minus = f(c_orig - eps)
        derivative = (f_plus - f_minus) / (-2 * eps)
        derivatives.append(derivative)
    return derivatives
